segments.text: Looking at this drawing, the kitchen seems full of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the sink's overflowing without anyone caring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor, puddle spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's absorbed in her plate, foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unstable; he could topple easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's waiting patiently, hand raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is kind of adorable amid the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes nearby might break if there's a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it all ends without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
